data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Oppland.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oppland, Norway
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 189,600 people living in the state of Oppland.

data.section_summary: On average, 24 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Oppland, Norway.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, let it be said of the 174,506 lost in Oppland that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Oppland to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Urdu people might believe through him.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Oppland, Norway to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Oppland. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Oppland, Norway has a population of 189,600.

We estimate Oppland has 15,094 people who might know Jesus, 150,536 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,970 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Oppland, Norway to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
